Creator: Aml Ahmed Elbana
Description:
Navbar overlaps carousel and text disappears on 990x382 screen size

Expected Result:

         Navbar should remain visually distinct and not overlap carousel
 Menu text should remain readable on all screen sizes

Actual Result:

          Navbar floats over the carousel images
Menu text is white and becomes unreadable due to background conflict
Environment: Chrome V. 138.0.7204.49                                                                                                 Windows 10                                                                                                                       Simulated device: Custom viewport
Custom field (StepsToReproduce):
1- Open DemoBlaze website
2- Click right
3- Choose inspect from the drop menu
4- Click ctrl+shift+M                                                                                                       5- Set screen dimensions to 990 × 382 px                                                                           6-  Observe the Navbar and the background image
